head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 76 papers. The special focus in this conference is on Chinese Intelligent Automation. The topics include: A Feature Selection Approach Based on Improved Binary Coyote Optimization Algorithm; Shanghai-Style Realistic Style Watercolor Painting Style Transfer by Using RSIM Evaluation; a Traffic Video Completion Model Based on Generative Adversarial Networks; a Method of Source Code Authorship Attribution Based on Graph Neural Network; CL-GCN: Malware Familial Similarity Calculation Based on GCN and Topic Model; intention Enhanced Dual Heterogeneous Graph Attention Network for Sequential Recommendation; multi-robot Cooperate Region Coverage Search Algorithm Based on Distributed Control; Deep Reinforcement Learning-Based LSTM Model for Traffic Flow Forecasting in Internet of Vehicles; design of Variable Structure Controller and Its Application in Rejection Platform Servo System; Vision and EMG Information Fusion Based on DS Evidence Theory for Gesture Recognition; novel Trajectory Planning Method Based on Double Quaternion and Tau Theory; UDE-Based Robust Walking Control of a Bipedal Robot; the Stochastic and Dynamic Vehicle Routing Problem: A Literature Review; salient Region Detection of Aerial Sea Detection Image Based on Fusion Algorithm; Guaranteed Cost Strategy for Hierarchical Game in Financial Systems: LMIs-Constrained Method; research on Civil Aviation Passenger Question Intention Recognition Based on Text Classification Method of Self-attention and Deep Neural Network; unsupervised Learning for Wafer Surface Defect Pattern Recognition; graph-Based Network for Depth Completion with Ground Completion; deep Convolutional Neural Network for Reproductive Performance Selection in Rooster Breeding; characteristic Model-Based Adaptive Control for Spacecraft Rendezvous and Proximity Operations; knowledge-Graph-Aware Recommendation in Movie Domain.

source.issuetitle: Proceedings of 2021 Chinese Intelligent Automation Conference

publisher.publishername: Springer Science and Business Media Deutschland GmbH
